embodiment.description: This handmade crafted soap basket is beeing fabricated in Japan by an old ninja monk. It has special power when you touch it with a sword.
embodiment.material: Special Wood from Japan black forest.
embodiment.shipping: Ships in 10 days. Comes with brown gift box
